evidence.text: Person B: Your cousin better show some respect around here or he ain't getting shit from the girls.
Person A: Gentlemen, please meet Ani. She'll take care of you tonight. Let me know if you need anything.
Person A: Thank you Ani! Love you! Thank you very much.

Person A: What? We just gave you New Year's.
Person A: Thank you Ani! Love you! Thank you very much.

Person A: She hit the Lotto, PowerBall and Mega Millions, bitch.
Person A: So this is for real? Because if so, I got to stop letting high rollers in. They're stealing my girls.
